001package io.jstach.rainbowgum.spi;
002
003import java.util.ArrayList;
004import java.util.Comparator;
005import java.util.List;
006import java.util.Optional;
007import java.util.ServiceLoader;
008import java.util.stream.Stream;
009
010import org.eclipse.jdt.annotation.Nullable;
011
012import io.jstach.rainbowgum.LogConfig;
013import io.jstach.rainbowgum.LogProperties;
014import io.jstach.rainbowgum.RainbowGum;
015import io.jstach.rainbowgum.ServiceRegistry;
016
017/**
018 * RainbowGum SPI. The Rainbow Gum SPI uses the {@link ServiceLoader} with the
019 * registration of <strong>this class</strong> and <em>NOT the <code>non-sealed</code>
020 * subclasses!</em> Read the {@link ServiceLoader} doc to understand how to register a
021 * service loader class. A common option is to use an annotation processor to generate the
022 * <code>META-INF/services</code> registration. There are several libraries that can do
023 * this:
024 * <ul>
025 * <li><a href="https://github.com/jstachio/pistachio#serviceloader-helper">Pistachio
026 * SVC</a></li>
027 * <li><a href="https://avaje.io/spi/">Avaje SPI</a></li>
028 * <li><a href="https://github.com/kohsuke/metainf-services">metainf-services</a></li>
029 * </ul>
030 * However if your application is fully modularized (has a <code>module-info.java</code>)
031 * you will need to use the module-info syntax:
032 * {@snippet : 
033 * 
034 * provides io.jstach.rainbowgum.spi.RainbowGumServiceProvider with com.mycompany.SomeService;
035 * 
036 * }
037 */
038public sealed interface RainbowGumServiceProvider {
039
040        /**
041         * Provides properties.
042         */
043        public non-sealed interface PropertiesProvider extends RainbowGumServiceProvider {
044
045                /**
046                 * Provides properties.
047                 * @param registry registry is usually empty here.
048                 * @return list of properties.
049                 */
050                List<LogProperties> provideProperties(ServiceRegistry registry);
051
052        }
053
054        /**
055         * Provides config from registry and properties.
056         */
057        public non-sealed interface ConfigProvider extends RainbowGumServiceProvider {
058
059                /**
060                 * Provide config from registry and properties.
061                 * @param registry registry.
062                 * @param properties properties.
063                 * @return config.
064                 */
065                LogConfig provideConfig(ServiceRegistry registry, LogProperties properties);
066
067        }
068
069        /**
070         * Called after {@link LogConfig} has been loaded to do various custom initialization
071         * like registering {@link io.jstach.rainbowgum.LogOutput.OutputProvider}s.
072         * <p>
073         * The configurator has the option to return <code>false</code> to indicate a retry
074         * needs to be made. This is a simple way to handle dependency needs of one
075         * configurator needing another to run prior.
076         *
077         * @see LogConfig#outputRegistry()
078         * @see ServiceRegistry
079         */
080        @FunctionalInterface
081        public non-sealed interface Configurator extends RainbowGumServiceProvider {
082
083                /**
084                 * Do adhoc initialization before RainbowGum is fully loaded.
085                 * @param config config.
086                 * @return <code>true</code> if all dependencies were found.
087                 */
088                boolean configure(LogConfig config);
089
090                /**
091                 * The default amount of passes made to resolve configurators.
092                 */
093                public static int CONFIGURATOR_PASSES = 4;
094
095                /**
096                 * Runs configurators. If a configurator returns false then it will be retried.
097                 * The default of {@value #CONFIGURATOR_PASSES} passes will be tried.
098                 * @param configurators stream of configurators.
099                 * @param config config to use for registration.
100                 * @throws IllegalStateException if there are configurators still returning
101                 * <code>false</code>.
102                 */
103                public static void runConfigurators(Stream<? extends RainbowGumServiceProvider.Configurator> configurators,
104                                LogConfig config) {
105                        runConfigurators(configurators, config, CONFIGURATOR_PASSES);
106                }
107
108                /**
109                 * Runs configurators. If a configurator returns false then it will be retried.
110                 * @param configurators stream of configurators.
111                 * @param config config to use for registration.
112                 * @param passes number of times to retry configurator if it returns
113                 * @throws IllegalStateException if there are configurators still returning
114                 * <code>false</code>.
115                 */
116                public static void runConfigurators(Stream<? extends RainbowGumServiceProvider.Configurator> configurators,
117                                LogConfig config, int passes) {
118                        List<Configurator> unresolved = new ArrayList<>(configurators.toList());
119                        for (int i = 0; i < passes; i++) {
120                                var it = unresolved.iterator();
121                                while (it.hasNext()) {
122                                        var c = it.next();
123                                        if (c.configure(config)) {
124                                                it.remove();
125                                        }
126                                }
127                                if (unresolved.isEmpty()) {
128                                        break;
129                                }
130                        }
131                        if (!unresolved.isEmpty()) {
132                                throw new IllegalStateException("Configurators could not find dependencies (returned false) after "
133                                                + passes + " passes. configurators = " + unresolved);
134                        }
135
136                }
137
138        }
139
140        /**
141         * Implement to create a custom RainbowGum. This is the preferred way to custommize
142         * RainbowGum publishers, appenders, and outputs.
143         */
144        public non-sealed interface RainbowGumProvider extends RainbowGumServiceProvider {
145
146                /**
147                 * Optionally provides a rainbow gum based on config.
148                 * @param config config loaded.
149                 * @return a rainbowgum or not.
150                 */
151                Optional<RainbowGum> provide(LogConfig config);
152
153                /**
154                 * Creates a default rainbow gum from a config.
155                 * @param config config.
156                 * @return rainbowgum.
157                 */
158                public static RainbowGum defaults(LogConfig config) {
159                        return RainbowGum.builder(config).build();
160                }
161
162                /**
163                 * If there are multiple rainbow gum providers found the higher priority ones are
164                 * tried first ({@link #provide(LogConfig)}). The default is {@code 0}.
165                 * <p>
166                 * This feature allows custom rainbow gums for different environments like a
167                 * testing version that lives in its own jar that is in maven scope test. If its
168                 * priority is higher and {@link #provide(LogConfig)} returns a non-empty optional
169                 * then it will be used instead of than the production rainbowgum.
170                 * @return priority order where higher number means it will be tried earlier.
171                 */
172                default int priority() {
173                        return 0;
174                }
175
176        }
177
178        /**
179         * Finds service providers based on type.
180         * @param <T> provider interface type.
181         * @param loader service loader to use.
182         * @param pt provider class.
183         * @return stream containing only provider of the given type.
184         */
185        public static <T extends RainbowGumServiceProvider> Stream<T> findProviders(
186                        ServiceLoader<RainbowGumServiceProvider> loader, Class<T> pt) {
187                return loader.stream().flatMap(p -> {
188                        if (pt.isAssignableFrom(p.type())) {
189                                var s = pt.cast(p.get());
190                                return Stream.of(s);
191                        }
192                        return Stream.empty();
193                });
194        }
195
196        /**
197         * Creates config from service loader.
198         * @param loader service loader.
199         * @return config.
200         */
201        public static LogConfig provideConfig(ServiceLoader<RainbowGumServiceProvider> loader) {
202                return LogConfig.builder().serviceLoader(loader).build();
203        }
204
205        /**
206         * Will load all RainbowGum SPI to create a RainbowGum powered from the ServiceLoader.
207         * @return rainbowgum.
208         */
209        public static RainbowGum provide() {
210                ServiceLoader<RainbowGumServiceProvider> loader = ServiceLoader.load(RainbowGumServiceProvider.class);
211                var config = provideConfig(loader);
212                @Nullable
213                RainbowGum gum = findProviders(loader, RainbowGumProvider.class)
214                        .sorted(Comparator.comparingInt(RainbowGumProvider::priority).reversed())
215                        .flatMap(s -> s.provide(config).stream())
216                        .findFirst()
217                        .orElse(null);
218
219                if (gum == null) {
220                        gum = RainbowGum.builder(config).build();
221                }
222                return gum;
223        }
224
225}
